name: WMSU Exploration Game
description:
The game has 2 modes

STORY MODE:

- You play as an incoming first year student and you are on your way to enroll. But due to a strong wind, your papers and requirements were blown away and you have to find all of it one by one to complete your enrollment. 

FREE MODE:

- Free roaming mode that allows you to directly venture in the map or look for sign posts🪧 for building info without completing the enrollment process.

Mechanics:

- Location of your objective is different depending on your college and course choice

- Follow the arrow indicator to guide you to your destination

- Collect the items/requirements mentioned to complete the quests

- Zoom in/out button can be activated for 2 seconds

- If you get stuck in an area or blocked by an NPC, click your profile at the upper left and back to the menu then continue the game to restart your position

Notes: this is an early prototype of the game and its first (and maybe the last) public release 

We mainly focus on the goal and purpose of the game so we didn't have time for its flexible compatibility, thus some phone's security might be blocking the game to run on your device because it is an unfamiliar app

Developer/Designer: Tingkoy Desu

Docu/Bug Finder: Emerson Rivera
